import React from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { getBlogs } from "../../middleware/data"; const Blog = () => { let blogs = getBlogs(); return (
Our Blog

Recent Blog

{blogs.map((blog) => (

{blog.author} {blog.createdAt}

{blog.name}

{blog.description}

))}
); }; export default Blog;
